content.html: Is there a good monitor for an m1 MacBook Air that: - is usb c (no fuckin dongles) - super crisp - not ultra wide - not curved I’m thinking of getting a permanent desk at my coworking space and I’m trying to stop myself getting another iMac
content.value:
Is there a good monitor for an m1 MacBook Air that:

- is usb c (no fuckin dongles)
- super crisp
- not ultra wide 
- not curved 

I’m thinking of getting a permanent desk at my coworking space and I’m trying to stop myself getting another iMac
